labels.shortDescription: Warning text before making a case as master from possible match list
labels.value: Are you sure you want to mark this case as Not Duplicate? This component will no longer be displayed once you confirm.

labels.shortDescription: Warning text before merging a case listed from possible match list
labels.value: Are you sure you want to merge this case with the case being viewed. This case will be turned into a screened case and will be related to the main case.

labels.shortDescription: Heading Text to be displayed for marking the Case as Master
labels.value: Mark this case as not duplicate

labels.shortDescription: Warning text before removing a case listed from possible match list
labels.value: Are you sure you want to remove this case from possible match list. This case will not be displayed on this list in future.

labels.shortDescription: Success Message post case has been marked as master
labels.value: This case has been marked as master

labels.shortDescription: Notification to display when no matching cases are found
Success Message post case has been removed from the list
labels.value: The case has been removed and will be excluded from Possible matches
